name: Nokia Over The Air Bitmap Image
summary: Learn about .OTB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: OTB files are transmitted as a series of one or more SMS text messages.
NOTE: Nokia Multimedia Player has been discontinued and is no longer available for download.

description: Over The Air (OTA) image used for transmitting pictures between Nokia and Siemens mobile phones; stores a black and white bitmap image containing a maximum of 255x255 pixels; may be saved in a hexadecimal text format or a binary format.
